#summary How to install extensions. 

----
*NOTE:* The project & documentation is in the process of moving to [https://github.com/OpenRefine/OpenRefine/wiki/Installing-Extensions]. Please check [https://github.com/OpenRefine/OpenRefine/wiki/Installing-Extensions there] first for the latest information. 
----

This is applicable to version 2.0 and later only.

Step 1. In Google Refine's front page (http://127.0.0.1:3333/), click Browse workspace directory at the bottom of the project list. This should open up the workspace directory in your system's file browser.

Step 2. In the workspace directory, create a sub-directory called "extensions" if there isn't one already.

Step 3. Shut down Google Refine.

Step 4. Download the extension .zip file and unzip it to a sub-directory under the "extensions" directory that you have just created.

Step 5. Start Google Refine up again.
